input.content:
#!/bin/bash

# Play sound when Claude stops working
# You can customize the sound command based on your system

# For Linux with PulseAudio/ALSA
if command -v paplay &> /dev/null; then
    # Play system sound
    paplay /usr/share/sounds/freedesktop/stereo/complete.oga 2>/dev/null &
elif command -v aplay &> /dev/null; then
    # Alternative using aplay
    aplay /usr/share/sounds/sound-icons/finish.wav 2>/dev/null &
elif command -v speaker-test &> /dev/null; then
    # Simple beep using speaker-test
    speaker-test -t sine -f 1000 -l 1 &>/dev/null &
    sleep 0.2
    pkill speaker-test 2>/dev/null
else
    # Fallback to terminal bell
    echo -e "\a"
fi
